title: PenPal: Footsteps by Dathan Auerbach (1/6) (Reboot)
description:
Every year for me and CreepsMcPasta's birthday, I re-record a story that I've loved and think I can improve on. For this year, I'm doing a story that I haven't touched in 7 years. The famous tale from Dathan Auerbach.

The Author: https://1000vultures.com/
Video!: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l9Bkl237L18
Read along!: [redacted]

Aminooo!: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.narvii.amino.x220474164&hl=en_US & https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mrcreepypasta-amino/id1142706153?mt=8

Check out my new books! A collection of Creepypastas compiled by some of my all time favorite authors and friends!
